Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Schwing
Reviews.Content: She loved it and that's what matters most!!Great accessories included with the package.Would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Lance
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the camera, it was actually a gift for my wife at Christmas.  Everything arrived as advertised and I think it was even a day or two prior to when I was supposed to get it. Great price for all the items you get in the bundle.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Duck
Reviews.Content: Was a gift and the receiver couldn't be more satisfied. All the extra features were a big plus as well.

Reviews.Title: Great package deal
Reviews.Author: Eddy Chance
Reviews.Content: I purchased this package deal for a friend and it has almost everything they needed for a first time photographer.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 10 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) + <2> Transcend 16GB Class10 SD Card +
<3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <4> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<5> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <6> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <7> Precision Design 57" Tripod +
<8> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <9> Transcend SD Memory Card Case + <10> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) with 16GB Card + Flash + Case + Filter + Remote + Tripod + Accessory Kit
